claim: Tactile media for visually impaired people
claimUSP: Tactile media - fast, good and simple

error.not whitelisted: This e-mail address has not been approved for registration.
error.display name already in use: This display name is already taken.

help.select_braille-system: A uniform $t(glossary:brailleScript) system should be used per document. All captions are created in the system selected here and existing captions are converted.
help.select_medium: Different media offer different possibilities. The editor will restrict functions for certain production techniques so that you do not design a draft that cannot be produced at all with swell paper, for example.

auth.invalid login, already an account with t: There is already an account under this e-mail address.
auth.The account you tried to create is curre: The account with this email address still needs to be verified. Please check your mailbox and spam folder.
auth.no matching login: No user account known with this e-mail address / password.
auth.There was an error creating your account: Error while creating a new account.

colour.#FFFFFF: Paper colors (our swell paper has a yellowish tint)
